about_the_game:
Time to play Battle Bros!
A turn-based, card battling, tabletop hybrid. Build your deck with cards you've obtained and put together a strategy that can't be beaten. Summon your characters to the battlefield and use your cards to equip them with gear and abilities to gain the edge on your opponent.



Battle Bros. combines grid-based combat and card battling elements to create a unique gameplay experience. This paired with an original setting and hand drawn art style make it a truly different kind of game to play.

Key Features

Singleplayer:
Face AI opponents, with multiple difficulties planned.

Multiplayer:
Face your friends and prove you have the better deck.

Character Customization:
Obtain different customizations and customize each of your characters for your team, including their look and stats.

Card Collection:
Earn cards through different means and collect the best cards for your deck.
